thread.title: This compilation of Arsenal fan videos shows just how bad the Gunners' meltdown has become
thread.title_full: This compilation of Arsenal fan videos shows just how bad the Gunners' meltdown has become

author: Thomas Bristow
title: This compilation of Arsenal fan videos shows just how bad the Gunners' meltdown has become
text:
This compilation of Arsenal fan videos shows just how bad the Gunners' meltdown has become Every season the Gunners go through the same cycle - but things have got pretty heated this time Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The ultimate Arsenal fan meltdown compilation Share this video Get Arsenal FC   Could   
It's safe to say Arsenal fans are a very unique breed of supporter. 
How many other fans do you know contemplate starting a crowd funding project to buy out their chairman's shares because they've lost a few games? 
And how many other sets of supporters have you come across who fly TWO separate planes with opposing messages over an away stadium? 
We know that Arsenal fans have long been vocal, but this season it seems as though things have completely and utterly boiled over. 
Why? There's a few things... A familiar sight this season (Photo: Matthew Lewis) 
The north Londoners have been knocked out of both the EFL Cup and the Champions League this term. Arsene Wenger looks set to stay. Star players Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil could go and to top it off, Arsenal sit sixth in the league. It goes on and on... 
In the video above, we've managed to successfully capture this spectacular Gunners meltdown with videos posted by Arsenal supporters throughout this season. Even the players can see the banners (Photo: Alex Morton) 
From fans arguing after the very first game of the season to supporters turning on Arsenal Fan TV, this compilation has it all. 
As the angry icing on the bitter cake, it also includes the man who compared Arsene Wenger to Robert Mugabe and the moment Piers Morgan threw his pen at a colleague. Yep, it came to that. If anyone knows how to stop this meltdown, please do get in touch. poll loading Arsenal fans! Who would you prefer if Arsene Wenger leaves in the summer? 3000+ VOTES SO FAR
